scripts.local-test-prepare-existing-assets: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --tags share-enablement-services --exclude-tags admin --env local --reporter-junit local-prepare-existing-assets-results.xml --reporter-html local-prepare-existing-assets-results.html --output local-prepare-existing-assets-results.json
scripts.local-test: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --exclude-tags admin,share-enablement-services --env local --reporter-junit local-results.xml --reporter-html local-results.html --output local-results.json
scripts.int-test-prepare-existing-assets: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --tags share-enablement-services --exclude-tags admin --env INT --reporter-junit int-prepare-existing-assets-results.xml --reporter-html int-prepare-existing-assets-results.html --output int-prepare-existing-assets-results.json
scripts.int-test: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --exclude-tags admin,share-enablement-services --env INT --reporter-junit int-results.xml --reporter-html int-results.html --output int-results.json
